reviews.review: Very fun game. It definitely has its ups and downs but overall it is very fun to play either by yourself our with a group of friends.

Just overall fun and I really enjoyed playing the game. Definitely better with other killer and survivors, but still fun without DLC. I love the amount of time and care that the devs put into the game and the amount of content that is added. I love the community, and I love the game.
Lag and Bug everytime i plays the killer

Short intro here:
- Experience new patch updates, with new killer and survivor, and also with brand new bugs to be discovered.
- In order to win a match, you should go hardcore and don't expect your teammate.
- Dedicated Server will let you discover new hitbox range by killer, for example, you may get hit from killer when you thought you and him have a far distance.
I have no friends to play with :(
Been playing it for about 36 hours now, it is indeed very thrilling, intense and fun!!
fun to play especially when you play with your team

Dead By Daylight, a Game where you get farmed and tunneled if you tea bag the killer, 
Rather a exciting and thrilling game, not just doing Gens but running the killer around is also fun

It's 2020 and this game still scares the daylights out of me, especially a doctor with a very confusing terror radius 

the only bad thing is dying on 1 hook moris
but that's just one of the experiences you will face in red ranks :-(

overall there will be days where i enjoy myself, and days where i wonder why i still play this game, facing red ranks is crazy enough, but having a rainbow team really makes you wonder what kind of player you are. I will obviously run to the exit gate and leave the rest if my team tries to farm me

get rid of that faggot ass fucking cooldown timer then you might have a good game
muy bueno , lastima esta lleno de bug

El juego es complejo y dificil al principio, pero es muy divertido jugar como sobreviviente y la parte de asesino, pues no es tan facil como parece, pero tiene su emocion.

Si tienes un team y te gusta el reto, este juego es genial.

In 13 hours of this game I've had a couple of what I would call fair, fun games.
Mostly, I have spent my time sitting in lobbies waiting for matches, or playing a game against someone who is horrendously mismatched. You can see the steam profile of the people you are playing against, once they have brutally slaughtered you, and in the 6 games I played yesterday, in every match we played against a killer with over 1000 hours in the game.
It seems that the only 2 types of people playing this game are new people who will give up after a similar amount of hours as myself, or people who play this and only this, never allowing new players to have a chance to get better.
It may well not be the dev's fault. It could be that if more people played then the matchmaking would be better, but as it is, it's broken and frustrating. It's such a shame, as I love the concept of this game. If you have 4 mates who are up for it, get it and just play custom matches. It's the only way you'll get any semblance of a balanced game and it's a whole lot of fun. If you're hoping to get a game that you can enjoy without a full party of 5 of you, this ain't it.
Oh yeah, forgot to mention the ludicrously OP dlc killers. It's a joke. The other reviews are right, dev's are more concerned with pumping out additional paid content than balancing what they have.
If anyone reading this has a suggestion for a well balanced asynchronous multiplayer like this, bang it in the comments!
Don't play this game if you want to have fun.
this is the best multiplayer horror game ever

Had over 3000 hours on PS4 so I decided to come to Steam and play. DbD is by far my favorite multiplayer game that I have ever played. An asymmetrical game done right, the balancing isn't perfect but it's easily overlooked with how fun the game actually is. Hard working developers with consistent updates that always send the game in a better direction. Also the horror icons in the game are extremely fun to play as. Can't recommend it enough!
Jogo muito bom. Meus amigos tem que por o meu volume no discord em 10% pq eu grito muito nesse jogo, Recomendo!

Dead By Daylight es un juego para jugar con amigos, no recomiendo jugar como superviviente solo pues la comunidad tiene problemas con el trabajo en equipo (aun cuando el juego lo fomenta de sobremanera) y tienden a dedicarse netamente a farmear puntos, no lo llamarÃ­a un juego casual pues es normal que tarde en encontrar partida, pero lo recomiendo totalmente para una noche de juegos con amigos, salen unas buenas risas de sus partidas.
En el apartado tÃ©cnico el juego ha mejorado bastante este aspecto con el tiempo, con la ultima actualizaciÃ³n el juego se optimizÃ³ bastante al pc, en cuanto a los grÃ¡ficos el juego va bastante bien, no tiene muchas texturas pero es bastante inmersivo en el ambiente tÃ©trico que se busca.
Quizas uno de los puntos dÃ©biles que me gustarÃ­a destacar es la falta de una "historia" o al menos una sucesion de eventos, conocer un poco mÃ¡s del pasado de los asesinos y los supervivientes mas alla de un par de cortometrajes en los archivos, darles personalidad podria potenciar el interÃ©s por jugar con un personaje o con otro, a eso tambiÃ©n se le suma el sistema de "perks" el cuÃ¡l funciona bastante bien para asesinos sin embargo para los supervivientes pierde un poco el sentido, ya que una vez teniendo todos los perks con todos los supervivientes no se nota la diferencia entre jugar con uno o con otro, quizas diferenciar a los supervivientes entregarÃ­a mayor dinamismo a la jugabilidad.
el Ãºltimo punto en contra de este juego es la excesiva cantidad de DLC, de por si el juego no es barato y si bien la mayorÃ­a de los personajes se pueden adquirir con puntos del juego, hay una parte que solo puede ser accesible mediante la compra de DLC's de pago, lo cual limita bastante y hasta podrÃ­a dar aires de "pay to win" pues obviamente los perks de estos personajes solo estarÃ¡n disponibles cuando se tiene al personaje.

En resumen es un juego entretenido y al ser competitivo permite largas horas de rejugabilidad, siempre hay objetivos por los cuales apostar y eso hace que ninguna partida sea igual a la anterior, totalmente recomendable para comprar siempre y cuando estÃ© en oferta.
Fun to play with friends would recommend just note hit boxes are quit messy
